attributes.action: Allow sufferers of Long Covid to receive Covid booster vaccinations on the NHS
attributes.additional_details: There is clinical evidence that the booster shots can help improve long Covid symptoms. Many of us have been suffering from fatigue, joint pains, 'brainfog' and other debilitating effects, often for years. This has a huge knock on effect on employment, benefits claims and sickness absence for those of us struggling to keep our jobs.
attributes.background: To include those diagnosed with long covid in the groups eligible to receive Covid booster vaccinations on the NHS.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund Covid booster vaccines for all, with priority for Long Covid sufferers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700009
